title: nAlage nAlage
sahitya:
nAlage nAlage nAlage siri lOlana nene kANo nAlage


caraNam 1    vAsudEvana nAma nAlage nI alEsgi nene kANo nAlage AseyoLage 
biddu mOsa hOgalu bEDa kEshavana nAmava nene kANo maruLe
    caraNam 2    mAtADuvalli nAlage nI anIti nuDiyadiru nAlage 
Atana nAmava gItadi pADuta sItApati raghunAthana nene kANo
    caraNam 3    acyuta nAmava nAlage nI bicciTTu nene kANo nAlage 
necci keDali bEDanicca sharIrava acyuta nAmava nene kANo maruLe
    caraNam 4    nannadu tannadu nAlage nInennadaliru kANo nAlage 
innu mUru dinadi samsAradi pannaga shyanana nene kANo maruLe
    caraNam 5    anudina harinAma nAlage nI neneyutaliru kANo nAlage ghana 
mahima purandara viTTalana kSaNa kSaNakomme nene kANo maruLe
